Reviews.Title: RemoteStart_astra
Reviews.Author: E. N. Maben "maven"
Reviews.Content: Works well. I installed it myself on my 2008 Sienna. I did not use the full functionality of this remote starter. Used only the remote start part and not the lock/unlock features. 2 way communication is working well. Having two remotes helps. 2 way remote has good range. I park my car atleast 250 feet away from the office building and able to start the car without getting out my chair.

ProductInfo.Features:
2 Car Operation With 1-Way Remotes
Plug-In User Programmable Coded Override Switch & Led On Antenna
Built-In Programmable Parking Light Relay (±)
True Rpm Sensing For Real Time Cranking
Remote Start Tachless Mode Using Adaptive Digital Processing
ProductInfo.Name: Remote Start With Keyless Entry ASTRA 1000RS-2W-1-DBP
